title: AdBlock Minus
shortDescription: Stop ad blocking on your site now. Reclaim lost revenue.
longDescription:
How much revenue do you lose every month to ad blockers?

AdBlock Minus is an easy-to-use system for recapturing lost revenue from your website or blog.
author: Anlob LLC
